column2: 1.1 - Preparation for the Works to be Undertaken
Acceptance Criteria: Ensure survey set out is undergone, excavation permit obtained and (if required) services in work(s) area isolated.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 004
Acceptance Criteria: Dig zone marked out and excavation undergone in accordance to relevant permit. Pit placed and levelled as per survey set out.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 004
Acceptance Criteria: Primary and secondary conduits positioned in pit according to IFC drawings.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 004
1.4 - Backfill and compaction of pit surrounds
Acceptance Criteria: Each pit shall be backfilled and compacted as per specification.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 004
Acceptance Criteria: Pits shall be labelled and directional markers placed. Lids to be secured and area cleaned/demolised.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 004
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Fulton Hogan’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
